.. _evaluation:

***********************************************
Evaluation Module (:mod:`radionets.evaluation`)
***********************************************

.. currentmodule:: radionets.evaluation


Introduction
============

:mod:`radionets.evaluation` contains evaluation methods
for the deep-learning framework.
